summary:
Add a Beauty Female Spellsword Follower called Hollie.
You can find her in Jorvaak, Whiterun
Support CBBE & UN7B.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=4][b][img]https://image.prntscr.com/image/BD9nyI84TJi1lAlGSs1j7Q.png[/img]
Description[/b] [/size]
Add a Beauty Female Spellsword (Conjurer) Follower called Hollie. 
You can find her in Jorvaak, Whiterun
Support CBBE & UN7B.

[img]https://image.prntscr.com/image/pzSm6BNvTlCLlC_J0ivxAg.png[/img]

[size=4][b]Info[/b][/size]
Name: Hollie Tran
Height: 168cm
Weight: 100
Age: 22 years old
Voicetype: Female Young Eager
Class: Spellsword (Conjurer)
Location: Jorvaak
Body: CBBE HDT Curvy (UN7B & 4k body available)
marriable
Note that: she is semi-powerful
My first standalone follower, leave pictures or comment if u like my mod :)

[b][size=4]Video
[/size][/b]comming soon...

[img]https://image.prntscr.com/image/e-lbsSygTHCTFn9eRsofvQ.png[/img]
